author: pcgeek86
body:
# Symptom

Error message:

```
update-help : Failed to update Help for the module(s) 'Microsoft.PowerShell.Operation.Validation' with UI culture(s)
{en-US} : The value of the HelpInfoUri key in the module manifest must resolve to a container or root URL on a website
where the help files are stored. The HelpInfoUri 'https://www.msn.com/?ocid=NEFLS000' does not resolve to a container.
At line:1 char:1
+ update-help -force
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidOperation: (:) [Update-Help], Exception
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : InvalidHelpInfoUri,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.UpdateHelpCommand
```
# Repro
1. Build a fresh Windows 10 Anniversary Update Enterprise Edition VM
2. Run `Update-Help -Force` under administrative PowerShell prompt

Cheers,
**Trevor Sullivan**
Docker Captain
Microsoft MVP: Cloud & Data Center Management
https://trevorsullivan.net
https://twitter.com/pcgeek86

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: This should already be fixed in a Win10 update PS version 5.1.14393.206

title: Error updating help on vanilla Windows 10 Anniversary build
